abstract: The Grammy Awards helped CBS finish No. 1 for the night over all. ABC ranked second for the night thanks to a two-hour “Extreme Makeover: Home Edition” at 8 p.m.
snippet: The Grammy Awards helped CBS finish No. 1 for the night over all. ABC ranked second for the night thanks to a two-hour “Extreme Makeover: Home Edition” at 8 p.m.
lead_paragraph: The Grammy Awards helped CBS finish No. 1 for the night over all, leading the 7 p.m. hour prior to the Grammy’s with “60 Minutes” (13 million viewers). ABC ranked second for the night thanks to a two-hour “Extreme Makeover: Home Edition” at 8 p.m. (15.8 million) followed by “Brothers & Sisters” at 10 p.m. (8.6 million).
